wikipedia_page.main: Maggie Kingsley is the pseudonym of Margaret Gray, a Scottish-born writer of Mills & Boon medical romances.  Apart from one book - For Jodie's Sake - all of her medical romances are set in Scotland.  In 2008 she also had "A Baby For Eve" published which is set in Cornwall and part of the "Brides Of Penhally Bay" series.

response: *Maggie Kingsley, real name Margaret Gray, writer
